question.title: Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock III
prompt: Say you have an array for which the ith element is the price of a given stock on day {{ i }}.
Design an algorithm to find the maximum {{ profit }}. You may complete at most two transactions.
Note: You may not engage in multiple transactions at the same time (i.e., you must sell the stock before you buy again).

explanations: Buy on day 4 (price = 0) and sell on day 6 (price = 3), profit = 3-0 = 3.
Then buy on day 7 (price = 1) and sell on day 8 (price = 4), profit = 4-1 = 3.
In this case, no transaction is done because it's not profitable to buy and sell.

hints: You need to divide the array into two parts to solve this problem.
